articles.title: Texas Instruments to make 'historic' $60bn US chip investment - BBC
articles.description: The announcement comes as Trump pressures big technology firms to increase manufacturing in America.
articles.content:
Computer chip giant Texas Instruments (TI) will invest more than $60bn (£44.74bn) in the US, as President Donald Trump pressures big technology firms to increase manufacturing in the country.
The co… [+1853 chars]
